sqlMap.select: SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_NM FROM MEMBER WHERE DEPT_NO = #dept_no#

SELECT D.INFO_NO, A.MEM_NO, A.MEM_NM, A.MEM_TEL, B.POSI_NM, C.DEPT_NM, A.MEM_BIRTH, A.MEM_ADDR1, A.MEM_ADDR2, A.MEM_MAIL, (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM DEPARTMENT C WHERE D.DEPT_NO=C.DEPT_NO) AS CH_DEPT_NM, (SELECT POSI_NM FROM POSITION B WHERE D.POSI_NO=B.POSI_NO) AS CH_POSI_NM, D.CHANGE_DATE FROM MEMBER A, POSITION B, DEPARTMENT C, MEMBER_INFO D WHERE A.POSI_NO = B.POSI_NO AND A.DEPT_NO = C.DEPT_NO AND A.MEM_NO = D.MEM_NO AND A.MEM_NO = #mem_no# ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT A.MEM_NO, A.MEM_NM, A.MEM_TEL, B.POSI_NM, C.DEPT_NM, A.MEM_BIRTH, A.MEM_ADDR1, A.MEM_ADDR2, A.MEM_MAIL FROM MEMBER A, POSITION B, DEPARTMENT C WHERE A.POSI_NO = B.POSI_NO AND A.DEPT_NO = C.DEPT_NO AND A.MEM_NO = #mem_no#
SELECT SALARY_NO, SALARY_NM, SALARY, PAYDAY FROM SALARY WHERE MEM_NO = #mem_no# ORDER BY 1 DESC
